languages.text: "Однажды Вольный Торговец устанет от тебя, нечисть, и даст свершиться правосудию. Ничто не доставляет мне большего удовольствия, чем предвкушение этого мига".
"One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."
languages.original_text: "Однажды Вольный Торговец устанет от тебя, нечисть, и даст свершиться правосудию. Ничто не доставляет мне большего удовольствия, чем предвкушение этого мига".

traits.locale_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “总有一天行商浪人会厌弃你，可憎的怪物。我愿意耐心等待，等待正义得到伸张的那一刻。”
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: “总有一天行商浪人会厌弃你，可憎的怪物。我愿意耐心等待，等待正义得到伸张的那一刻。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Un jour, abomination, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se lassera de vous, et alors, justice pourra être rendue. Je vis dans l'attente de ce moment. »
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, abomination, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se lassera de vous, et alors, justice pourra être rendue. Je vis dans l'attente de ce moment. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eines Tages wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Eurer überdrüssig sein, Abscheulichkeit, und der Gerechtigkeit ihren Lauf lassen. Nichts bereitet mir größeres Vergnügen als die Vorfreude auf diesen Augenblick."
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Eurer überdrüssig sein, Abscheulichkeit, und der Gerechtigkeit ihren Lauf lassen. Nichts bereitet mir größeres Vergnügen als die Vorfreude auf diesen Augenblick."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ある日、自由開拓者は悪どいお前に飽き、正義が行われるようになるでしょう。その瞬間への期待ほど、私に喜びを与えてくれるものはない」
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: 「ある日、自由開拓者は悪どいお前に飽き、正義が行われるようになるでしょう。その瞬間への期待ほど、私に喜びを与えてくれるものはない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Algún día, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se cansará de ti, abominación, y dejará que la justicia siga su curso. Nada me da más placer que la anticipación de ese momento».
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

traits.locale_text: «Algún día, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se cansará de ti, abominación, y dejará que la justicia siga su curso. Nada me da más placer que la anticipación de ese momento».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."

languages.text: "Bir gün Hür Tacir senden sıkılacak ucube ve adalet yerini bulacak. Hiçbir şey o anın beklentisinden daha fazla haz vermiyor."
languages.original_text: "One day the Rogue Trader will tire of you, abomination, and let justice be done. Nothing gives me more pleasure than the anticipation of that moment."
